meanings.definition: A sudden feeling of excitement and pleasure
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride gave me thrills.
meanings.sent2: Watching a suspenseful movie can bring thrills.
meanings.sent3: Feeling thrills while watching a horror movie is quite common.
meanings.sent4: The thrills of skydiving are like a rush of joy.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing thrills on a water slide is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel excited and pleased
meanings.sent1: The magician thrills the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party thrilled her beyond words.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist in the movie thrilled everyone.
meanings.sent4: His performance on stage thrilled the entire crowd.
meanings.sent5: The news of her promotion thrilled her to no end.
